verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I hear the Savior say, “Thy strength indeed is small, Child of weakness, watch and pray, Find in Me thine all in all.”

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Jesus paid it all, All to Him I owe; Sin had left a crimson stain, He washed it white as snow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord, now indeed I find Thy pow’r, and Thine alone, Can change the leper’s spots, And melt the heart of stone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For nothing good have I Whereby Thy grace to claim-- I’ll wash my garments white In the blood of Calv’ry’s Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when, before the throne, I stand in Him complete, "Jesus died my soul to save," My lips shall still repeat.
